sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-container fluid="md" align="left" class="anuncio">
    <hide-at breakpoint="medium">
      MOBILE
    </hide-at>
    <show-at breakpoint="mediumAndAbove">
      DESKTOP
    </show-at>

  </b-container>
</template>
<script>
import PortfolioCards from '@/components/PortfolioCards.vue'
import IdCard from '@/components/IdCard.vue' //Quitar componente y hacer el componente card PORTAFOLIOS
import {showAt, hideAt} from 'vue-breakpoints'



export default {
  name: 'anuncioWerk-route',
  components: {
    PortfolioCards,
    IdCard,
    hideAt,
    showAt
  },
  beforeRouteLeave(to, from, next) {
    const answer = window.confirm('Do you really want to leave? you have unsaved changes!')
    if (this.is_editing) {
      next();
    } else if (answer) {
      next();
    } else {
      next(false);
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      is_editing: false,
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>

  .anuncio {
    margin-top: 60px;
  }

  .btn-volver {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: gray;
  }

  .actions-werk-object {
    border: 1px solid #000;
    border-radius: 10px;
    display: flex;
    width: 150px;
    min-width: 150px;
    max-width: 150px;
  }

  .action-werk-object {
    font-size: 1.37em;
    background-color: transparent;
    color: #dbdada;
    border: none;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
  }

  .action-werk-object:hover {
    color: #5CD895;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: none;
  }

  .action-werk-object:active,
  .action-werk-object:focus {
    color: #5CD895;
    background-color: transparent !important;
    border: none;
  }

  @media only screen and (max-width:768px) {
    .anuncio-banda-costo-mv, .anuncio-tags-mv,
    .anuncio-card-mv{
      display: none!important;
    }

    .anuncio-banda-costo-dv, .anuncio-tags-dv,
    .anuncio-card-dv {
      display: block!important;
    }
  }

  .anuncio-banda-costo-mv, .anuncio-tags-mv, .anuncio-card-mv {
    display: block;
  }

  .anuncio-banda-costo-dv, .anuncio-tags-dv, .anuncio-card-dv {
    display: none;
  }





  .anuncio-mf-view{
    width: 100%;
  }
  @media only screen and (min-width:768px) {
    .anuncio-mf-view{
      width: 50%;
    }
  }
  .anuncio-tagssss {
    height: 50px;
    padding-right: 15px;
    padding-left: 15px;
  }

  @media only screen and (min-width:768px) {
    .anuncio-tagssss {
      position: relative;
      left: 0;
      top: -199px;
      margin-bottom: -199px;
    }
  }

h1,
h5 {
  color: #000 !important;
  font-weight: 900 !important;
}

@media only screen and (max-width:992px) {
  h1 {
    font-size: 2rem !important;
  }

  h5 {
    font-size: 1rem;
  }

  p {
    font-size: .82rem;
  }

}

  @media only screen and (max-width:776px) {
    .anuncio {
      padding-left: 30px;
      padding-right: 30px;
    }
  }


@media only screen and (min-width:992px) and (max-width:1040px) {
  .anuncio {
    padding: 40px 40px 0 40px;
  }
}

@media only screen and (min-width:1200px) and (max-width:1250px) {
  .anuncio {
    padding: 40px 40px 0 40px;
  }
}

.badge-tags {
  font-size: 11px;
  font-weight: 800;
  padding: 6px 20px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  color: #05386B;
  background-color: #5CD895;
}

.badge-tags:hover {
  color: #05386B;
  background-color: #8EE4AF;
}

.carousel-item {}

#SP-Carousel {
  margin: 0px 0px 30px 0px !important;
  padding-left: 0px !important;
  padding-right: 0px !important;
  border: 3px solid #F5CB5C;
}

@media only screen and (min-width:1440px) {
  .content {
    padding-left: 160px;
    padding-right: 160px;
  }
}

/* Si se quiere modificar el contenedor de esta vista
   es mejor que no use el container usado global
.container {
    max-width: 100% !important;
}
*/

@media only screen and (max-width:576px) {
  .offset-1 {
    margin-left: auto !important;
    margin-right: auto !important;
  }
}
</style>
